Title: Allows prospective and current agency personnel receive certification through remote training methods
Summary: Allows prospective and current agency personnel receive certification through remote training methods; requires the establishment of rules and regulations of such remote training.
LawCode: Amd ยง409-g, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to allowing prospective and current agency personnel complete training through remote training methods
